La version 2.1.0 de HRMS est basée sur la version 15 de Frappe HRMS.
Une grande partie des changements cités ci-dessous ont été développés par l'équipe de Frappe Technologies et les contributeurs aux logiciels de l'éco-système Frappe/ERPNext
Le détail des changements publiés dans Dokos est disponible sur
Add new doctype for Job offer Term Template
(Interview): Add setting for sender in interview & interview feedback reminder emails
Add Amount Based on Formula to list view & fix UX
Option to enable/disable multiple Shift Assignments for same dates
Comp leave request fails on leave period boundary dates
Update job applicant status on interview submit
Url encoding in job application routes
NoneType' Iteration Error in Salary Slip Loan Processing
Temporary fix for HRA exemption tests
(Org Chart): Check if company is set before loading children
Duplicate Overwritten Salary error for other employee
(Payroll): Accrual entry creation fails if any employee has no earnings
Rewrite attendance query in qb & add test for half-day attendance overwritten by leave application
(france): Don't overwrite Leave Type if modified between migrations
Half Day Leave Application Link To Half Day Attendance
Journals as invoice throwing validation error"
Journals as invoice throwing validation error
Consider previous Leave Applications while enforcing Maximum Consecutive Leaves Allowed
(PWA): Validate mandatory fields in form view on client-side
(Leave Application): Resolved leave type missing for accurate payroll processing
Disable Same Date Multiple Shift Assignments by default
Creation of duplicate Additional Salary with Overwrite Salary Structure Amount enabled
Check the leave type name instead of leave_type_name
Fix installation in setup & flaky tests

Dokos dispose d'un module de gestion de lieu intégré avec le reste des fonctionnalités du logiciel. Il permet de gérer des activités diverses pour répondre aux besoins très variés des différents Tiers Lieux.
